project.description:
Release build of ControlCenter Nimbus_8.5.0 - Generate Installer
    - repo: https://bitbucket.org/nxtlbs-devops/destiny-installer
    - branch: origin/onprem/nimbus/8.5.0/release/release-8.5.0

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +x export NLEXTERNALDIR=D:/P4/external export NLEXTERNALDIR2=D:/P4/main_external export JAVA_HOME=$NLEXTERNALDIR2/j2sdk/jdk1.7.0_71
export DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT=D:/Jenkins/workspace/source_destiny-ui_Nimbus_OnPremise export TECHPUBS_HELP_ROOT=D:/Jenkins/workspace/destiny-Nimbus-8.5-help-OnPremise
set +x echo "################################################################################" echo "INFO: Git info about current state of DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT" echo "INFO: DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT is ${DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT}" cd ${DESTINY_UI_SRC_TREE_ROOT}/ git show --quiet --no-patch HEAD echo "################################################################################"
echo "################################################################################" echo "INFO: Git info about current state of TECHPUBS_HELP_ROOT" echo "INFO: TECHPUBS_HELP_ROOT is ${TECHPUBS_HELP_ROOT}" cd ${TECHPUBS_HELP_ROOT}/ git show --quiet --no-patch HEAD echo "################################################################################" set -x
cd ${WORKSPACE}/ source ./setEnv ./buildRelease
